english.segment1: You are filled with compassion and mercy and grace. With Your banner of love over me. I am longing to see You one day face to face. And to be with You endlessly. Lord, how lovely You are to me
english.segment2: (Chorus). Lovely Lord. You are all to me. Lovely Lord. Full of purity. Worthy of honor and majesty. Lord, how lovely You are to me
english.segment3: You are bright as the sunrise and fairest of all. Unto You all the glory will be. You are God of creation and Lord of my life. I will worship You faithfully. Lord, how lovely You are to me
english.segment5: We will worship the name of the Holiest One. We will worship Your excellency. We will give You the glory. For things You have done. And be thankfully eternally. Lord, how lovely You are to me
english.segment7: Lord, how lovely You are to me.
